DOC.criteria: Women age 18 old Heterosexual Experiencing regular menstrual cycle ( 1 miss menstrual period past 6 month ) . Currently involve stable , sexually active relationship . Fluent English language . Selfreport sexual aversion distress ; distress related history unwanted coercive sexual contact . Perimenopausal menopausal status , > 1 miss menstrual period previous 6 month ; currently pregnant , breastfeed , breastfed within past 3 month ; clinically significant untreated renal endocrine disease . History HIV infection active , untreated pelvic , vaginal , urinary tract infection include sexually transmit disease chlamydia , genital herpes , gonorrhea , syphilis . Previous major pelvic surgery may cause nerve damage , include hysterectomy , vulvectomy , circumcision , colostomy , cystostomy , serious bladder , rectal , abdominal surgery ; neurological impairment due diabetes , stroke , pelvic nerve damage secondary trauma , cancer treatment , myasthenia gravis , multiple sclerosis spinal cord damage . Selfreport untreated psychosis ( e.g. , bipolar disorder schizophrenia ) . Women use caffeine product regularly ( i.e. , daily basis ) . Women receive follow medication exclude study , show alter sexual function arousal response : Dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) , testosterone androgen , estrogen ( except oral contraceptive ) , progesterone , tamoxifen , raloxifene , selective estrogen receptor modulators ( SERMs ) , Beta blocker drug affect autonomic nervous system and/or cardiovascular system , approve experimental medication treatment use enhance sexual response ( e.g. , sildenafil ) , antidepressant
